trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANPIX128_03716_SEQ_00<tab>Uin Nee wants help in testing a new love potion. What could possibly go wrong?
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANPIX128_03716_TODO_00<tab>Test the fake true love potion on the dozing Nu Mou in Pla Enni.
TEXT_BANPIX128_03716_TODO_01<tab>Report to Uin Nee.

TEXT_BANPIX128_03716_UINNEE_000_001<tab>Dearest mortal, is there anything more tragic than unrequited love? Nay! Nay, says I! Oh, the heartbreak! The pining! The woe! How could anyone with a shred of compassion in their heart ignore a mortal so besieged by melancholy longings!?
TEXT_BANPIX128_03716_UINNEE_000_002<tab>Not me! And that's why I made a love potion! Well, a dream love potion. A real one would be downright creepy! We fae do have some scruples, you know.

TEXT_BANPIX128_03716_UINNEE_000_003<tab>The problem is, I'm new to all of this alchemy nonsense, and I have no idea if my potion will work! I keep trying to sneak up on sleeping Nu Mou to test it, but it's like they can smell me coming!

TEXT_BANPIX128_03716_UINNEE_000_004<tab>I'm sure that you could manage it, though! And I <var 1A 02 /var>know<var 1A 01 /var> you wouldn't want to stand in the way of true love! Well, fake true love. Well, dream fake true love. Anyway! Go and test the potion!
TEXT_BANPIX128_03716_NUMOU03716_000_010<tab>No... Stop eating...my house... <snore>
TEXT_BANPIX128_03716_NUMOU03716_000_011<tab>Wha─!?
TEXT_BANPIX128_03716_NUMOU03716_000_012<tab>Goodness, if it isn't the very hero who restored to us the night!
TEXT_BANPIX128_03716_NUMOU03716_000_013<tab>What brings you here today? And looking so lovely, I might add! Yes... I daresay I've never seen such a divine visage in all my life...
TEXT_BANPIX128_03716_NUMOU03716_000_014<tab>W-Wait! I didn't mean to express my undying affectio─ Oh no! I've done it again!

TEXT_BANPIX128_03716_NUMOU03716_000_015<tab>Please, um... Please read this, when you have a moment. Which will likely be never, as I'm sure you're most busy being clever and courageous and─ Er, forget that I said anything!
TEXT_BANPIX128_03716_NUMOU03716_000_016<tab>Oh, I knew the leafmen would come for me! It was only a matter of time!
TEXT_BANPIX128_03716_UINNEE_000_020<tab>You tested it? And? And!?
TEXT_BANPIX128_03716_UINNEE_000_021<tab>Oooh, a letter written in fae! Let me see!
TEXT_BANPIX128_03716_UINNEE_000_022<tab>Hmm... Oh <var 1A 02 /var>dear<var 1A 01 /var>... Well, that's─ Oooh. And... Ahahaha! Haha... Oh, that doesn't even rhyme! HahahaHAHAHA!

TEXT_BANPIX128_03716_UINNEE_000_023<tab>Haha... <wheeze> Ahem! You probably shouldn't look at this. It's <var 1A 02 /var>painfully<var 1A 01 /var> embarrassing. For them, and also for you. But don't worry─the potion will wear off after a while, and they won't remember a thing!

TEXT_BANPIX128_03716_UINNEE_000_024<tab>It looks like I might need to water it down a bit for next time, though. There's smitten, and then there's...whatever in the name of Titania that drivel was supposed to be. Back to the cauldron I go!
TEXT_BANPIX128_03716_UINNEE_000_025<tab>Huh. That's interesting. Now, if they had seen an irresistibly attractive leafman, it might still be usable, but that doesn't seem to be the case...

TEXT_BANPIX128_03716_UINNEE_000_026<tab>Maybe it didn't work because Nu Mou are too different from you mortals? Or maybe that specific Nu Mou has a bizarre fixation on leafmen! I could check their dreams to make sure, but I'm a little afraid of what I might find...
TEXT_BANPIX128_03716_UINNEE_000_027<tab>Best to try a different formula, I think! I can count on you to test a new batch when I'm done, right? Of course I can!
